availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander H. Dudley (Lyon County, Kentucky, court clerk)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, court clerk. Kentucky native. Married Susan Dudley. Father of Robert Dudley, Benjamin Dudley, George A. Dudley, Frances "Fanny" A. Dudley, and Anna Bell Dudley. Married to Maria E. Jenkins Dudley on September 11, 1856. Father of Walter Dudley. Commercial merchant in Hickman, Kentucky, in 1850. Delegate from Lyon County to the 1860 Democratic National Convention. Clerk of the Lyon County Court from 1858 to 1863.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fulton County, Hickman, p. 224; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 99; Jordan Dodd, Kentucky Marriages, 1802-1850, Ancestry, Caldwell County, Kentucky, September 11, 1856; The Louisville Daily Courier (Louisville, Ky.), December 10. 1859; Thomas S. Page, Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts, of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1859 (Frankfort, KY: John B. Major, 1860), p. 292; Administrator’s and Executor’s Bond Books, 1854-1978, Ancestry, Lyon County, Administrator’s Bond, June 1864; KYR-0001-029-0096; KYR-0001-029-0548.
